page.title: 16Forge Garage & Ford Place
page.content: {Penshurst Garage Before the forge was a garage it was a blacksmiths forge. It has been a garage for 19 years. Mr Streeter has worked there since it was a garage. It belongs to Penshurst Place. The garage was built as a blacksmiths forge in 1966. It has been robbed 3 times. Once the robbers took the safe out of the wall, they stole Â£600. {Ford Place} Ford Place which was the manor house of the ancient manor of Hepstroke. A name which occurs in one of the "yokes" in Roman times. It is stated to have been the residence of the Sidney family before they were given Penshurst Place by Edward VI in 1552 and certainly seems to have been used as their dower house as it is referrd to as "fford pallace".
